trivia_items.text: Her name means "peace" in Greek as in the Greek goddess of peace.
Irene has the traits of a Great Skua (Stercorarius skua) according to a Q&A with aZLing4.
Irene's English dialogues are spoken with a Spanish accent.
Irene has been a subject of jokes in the Arknights community:
sub_items:
In the EN community, Irene's rather ample forehead is often subjected to teasing remarks, most notably with playing tic-tac-toe on her forehead having been a fairly common meme since her first appearance in Under Tides. See this video for an example.
This meme gained in popularity with her playability. Several fanarts and memes depicted Irene's forehead with a game of tic-tac-toe being played on it.
This meme gained in popularity with her playability. Several fanarts and memes depicted Irene's forehead with a game of tic-tac-toe being played on it.
Another joke in the EN community is Irene's forehead is so "bright" like Iberia's future, or can be used as a beacon.
In the CN community, she is a part of the joke on Rie Kugimiya, the seiyu known for her tsundere scolding style during concerts, like this one.

Yet another joke, though prominent in both EN and CN communities, is the relationship between Irene and Specter the Unchained due to the former getting constantly teased by the latter in Stultifera Navis story.
